_sText:
<< Surf_retroartz >>

-------------------------------------------------------

Changes:

-Removed trigger_hurt above spikes.

-Changed light map scale from 1128 down to 64.

-Added CT spawns.

-Added combat jail + punishment jail.

-Removed the "Pussy stop".

-Minor bug fixes all around.

-------------------------------------------------------

Thanks to tilt for the awesome nade fighting jail. You will be released every 30 seconds.

-------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy & Have fun !
